remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果欄位是`static`，則`obj`參數會被忽略。If the field is `static`, the `obj` parameter is ignored. 對於非靜態欄位，`obj`應繼承或宣告欄位類別的執行個體。For non-static fields, `obj` should be an instance of a class that inherits or declares the field. 傳回型別是。The return type of is . 比方說，如果基本的欄位保留為布林值的執行個體使用適當的布林值會傳回值。For example, if the field holds a Boolean primitive value, an instance of with the appropriate Boolean value is returned. 傳回值之前,檢查使用者是否具有存取權限。Before returning the value, checks to see if the user has access permission. 完全信任的程式碼會略過存取限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully-trusted code. `Private` 建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可供存取，且只要完全信任程式碼使用反映來叫用。`Private` constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully-trusted.

exception.span: 不支援這個方法。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetConstant(object defaultValue) cil managed

param.name: defaultValue
param.span: 這個欄位的新預設值。

span.span: The new default value for this field.

summary.span: 設定這個欄位的預設值。

span.span: Sets the default value of this field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `defaultValue` 僅限於下列類型： `Boolean`， `SByte`， `Int16`， `Int32`， `Int64`， `Byte`， `UInt16`， `UInt32`， `UInt64`， `Single`， `Double`， `DateTime``Char`， `String`，和`Enum`。`defaultValue` is restricted to the following types: `Boolean`, `SByte`, `Int16`, `Int32`, `Int64`, `Byte`, `UInt16`, `UInt32`, `UInt64`, `Single`, `Double`, `DateTime`, `Char`, `String`, and `Enum`. CLS 合規性的欄位型別是參考型別，如果需要`defaultValue`要`null`。If the field type is a reference type, CLS compliance requires `defaultValue` to be `null`. 不過，從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，`defaultValue`可以為非 null 的參考類型，只要此值可以指派給該參考型別。However, starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], `defaultValue` can be non-null for a reference type as long as the value can be assigned to that reference type. 例如，`Int32`值可以指派給類型的欄位。For example, an `Int32` value can be assigned to a field of type . 這不符合 CLS 標準，但它可以是在 interop 的案例中很有用。This is not CLS-compliant, but it can be useful in interop scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將指派`val`參數的欄位，這個執行個體所反映在 `obj`。This method will assign the `val` parameter to the field reflected by this instance on `obj`. 如果欄位是靜態的`obj`將會被忽略。If the field is static, `obj` will be ignored. 對於非靜態欄位，`obj`應繼承或宣告欄位類別的執行個體。For non-static fields, `obj` should be an instance of a class that inherits or declares the field. 新的值被當做。The new value is passed as an . 例如，如果欄位的類型為布林值，執行個體值會傳遞適當的布林值。For example, if the field's type is Boolean, an instance of with the appropriate Boolean value is passed. 設定值之前,檢查使用者是否具有存取權限。Before setting the value, checks to see if the user has access permission. 完全信任的程式碼會略過存取限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully-trusted code. `Private` 建構函式、 方法、 欄位和屬性可供存取，且只要完全信任程式碼使用反映來叫用。`Private` constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully-trusted. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法目前並不支援。This method is currently not supported. 因應措施，擷取反映已完成的類型和呼叫設定欄位的值。As a workaround, retrieve the by reflecting on the finished type and call to set the value of the field.

exception.span: 不支援這個方法。
